item.description:
PLEASE NOTE THE DATE HAS CHANGED! PLEASE REVISE YOUR RSVPS (with what you are bringing) TO REFLECT THE DATE CHANGE!

NEW DATE is THURSDAY August 13th.

Lets get together for a picnic and watch the performance.
We can meet before the show starts to get a good spot and start to eat.
Please consider this an outdoor potluck. Bring enough to share. When you RSVP please say what you will bring.

Prior to the event I will send out an email with details about meeting.

The show is free.
Meetup cost $1pp

http://www.commshakes...
item.name: RESECHEDULED: 'The Comedy of Errors' Shakespeare in the park
